sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Clear the read-only flag on the wf_context.workflow column so that context variables of types that check for write-permissions (password2) will be editable</description> <name>Make context variables editable</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary"); gr.addQuery("name", "wf_context"); gr.addQuery("element", "workflow"); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { gr.setValue("read_only", false); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>russ.sarbora</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-08-21 16:25:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>117a261453300300455d435723dc342b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Make context variables editable</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Workflow Runtime Engine" source="com.glideapp.workflow">42a009c76d2620100acb70b35343304a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_117a261453300300455d435723dc342b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>russ.sarbora</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-08-21 16:25:52</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
